name: Sunflower Bullet Hell
description:
Blast your way through the sky to go against the Sun, as a sunflower out for revenge!

You're a sunflower, and you seek vengeance against the Sun! Why, you ask? Who knows?

Instructions
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • J/Z to Shoot
  • K/X to Time Hocket (to slow down time)
  • Hold L/C to move player slowly (to avoid bullets!)
Credits
  • Programming by Remtaine - remtaine.com
  • Music, SFX, and Graphics by Overdubs - linktr.ee/overdubs
Version

Currently at v1.0

Note: This game is still a work in progress and does not represent the final product. Follow for more updates!
